item.title: (un)Official Rules of Craft Beer - Gatherings
item.description: An intelligent man is sometimes forced to be drunk to spend time with his fools. â€“ Ernest Hemingway This past weekend my friends and I gathered for a yearly weekend event that we have gathered together for the last twelve years. This year had to make some changes to standard craft beer itinerary in order to keep all of us safe, but we also needed to spend some time outside now that the brutal summer heat of Arizona had finally subsided.
